ARABIC: لَا يُسْـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفْعَلُ وَهُمْ يُسْـَٔلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will not be questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He cannot be questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: None shall question Him about what He does, but they shall be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He will not be questioned about anything He does, but all people will be questioned about their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He is not questioned whatever He does, whereas they will all be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He cannot be questioned as to what He does, while they will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He cannot be questioned concerning what He does and they shall be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He shall not be questioned as to what He does, but they shall he questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will not be questioned as to that which He doeth, but they will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: None shall question Him about His works, but they shall be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He shall be questioned not as to that which He doth, while they shall be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He is not questioned concerning what He does, but they are questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He cannot be questioned for His acts, but they will be questioned (for theirs).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He cannot be questioned as to what He does, while they will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is not to be questioned about what He does, but they shall be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will not be questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:23] He shall not be questioned about what He does, but they shall be questioned, about their actions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will not be questioned as to that which He doeth) Allah will not be questioned about what He says, commands or does, (but they will be questioned) and the servants will be asked about what they say and do.
